body.name: Microfiber Mop for Floor Cleaning, 18" Flat Mop for Hardwood Floors, Laminate Floor Mop for Cleaning with Extendable Handle, 4 Reusable Mop Pads, Wet and Dust Mops for Floor Cleaning,Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 11 mins
features: 【MOP HEAD ANTI-SLIP DESIGN】Don't stop just to tighten your mop handle again! Use Locking Pin lock the mop head in place. You can mop for hours without needing to re-tighten the handles.

【WORK ON EASY】The 18-inch base covers a lot of areas in one scan for efficient cleaning. Industrial grade mop with stainless steel handle to withstand friction and frequent use, and mop head made of aluminum alloy, more durable than plastic mop head. Velcro design makes the pad easier to install and replace.

【MICROFIBER PADS——DRY USE/ADSORBING DEBRIS】 Ultra fine open weave microscopic fbers with the natural clinging power, designed for hair dust & fur attraction. The microfiber mop pad acts like a magnet to absorb and pick up debris easily, locks them in the fabric fibers until the fabric is washed.

【SCRUB PADS——WET USE/DEEP CLEAN】 Blend weave structure for extreme water retention and superior dirt removal properties. Uses the magic of thousands of microfibers to removes the smallest dirt and dust particles without leaving streaks or scratches on the floor.

【ERGONOMIC DESIGN】The telescopic handle extends from 48 inches to 58 inches, so anyone can mop comfortably without bending over. 360 degree rotating mop head cleans corners better and helps for mopping underneath furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product seems to be very well made. It does just as it is described to do and that is clean floor. Now with that being said it would also be great item to wash down or dust walls as well with the appropriate pad applied. It comes with multiple pads in 2 different types, one for dry sweeping and the other for wet mopping. It also comes with a hand little item to clean the hair and dust bunnies from the pad during use. To me this one part is so important and makes all the difference in using the product overall because you can remove debris from the pad without having to change it as often if the tool wasn't being used. Plus the item snaps directly to the handle so your not having to try and keep up with it as it will always be within reach on the products handle. The head rotates 360 degrees and you can maneuver the sweeper/mop to easily get up under furniture much easier. My wife and I both love the product and agree that it has helped to remove a lot more pet hair than using our old similar product that you have to buy replacement throw away pads for that don't last very long at all The ability of the pads to be washed and reused makes all the difference and having multiple pads of each style makes sure your never out of the fight to keep your floors clean. Overall I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to help keep their home clean and remove hair, dust, and debris from the floors prior to mopping. Along with all the benefits you get from buying this, the price is unbeatable for what all you receive. We purchased 2 extra ones after we first used/reviewed this to give as Christmas gifts to my sister and sister in law.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the purpose
reviews.reviewText: The mop/duster is great and the handle can allow the head to swivel or it can be fixed in position, depending on your preference. And don't overlook the little grey plastic brush! It cleans the pad very nicely, with one drawback: it dislodges easily from the handle and can become lost. I store mine separately from the mop. Again, this is a great mop/duster!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for light mopping
reviews.reviewText: Decent mop the Velcro that attaches the pads is super strong it’s lightweight, cleaning pads are very nice quality. Super easy to assemble. I wouldn’t use this mop for heavy duty cleaning, but it works great in my little condo. It does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this mop. Covers a large area and has washable pads. So easy and convenient.

reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mop twice and both times the hole didn’t align with the attachment piece for the mop head. The second time I received the pole was bent, as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It keeps coming apart
reviews.reviewText: I started cleaning the walls and it started swiveling left and right then it fell off. Had to snap it back on it worked good for a few minutes then it started swiveling again and popped off.
